entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Kugluktuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:50 a.m. MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.7Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023
